attributes.action: actually read the petitions created on this website himself, to take a measure of how strong British peoples' feelings are; then to actually DO something, take some action, make us believe he is genuine and caring.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the people who petition the Prime Minister have strong feelings about whatever it is that they are petitioning him about. The government usually answers in a bland, political way, getting out of actually DOING something, or taking some action to make people think the government is actually listening to us. We are writing in because we want something done, we do not want to be brushed aside.
